article:
'Success' is an unincorporated township located in Coos County, New Hampshire,
USA. It is located directly to the east of the city of Berlin, New Hampshire,
and borders on the state of Maine. Success is part of the Berlin, NHâ€“VT
Micropolitan Statistical Area.

As of the 2010 census, the township had a population of 0. United States Census Bureau,
[http://factfinder2.census.gov/main.html American FactFinder], 2010 Census
figures. Retrieved March 23, 2011.

As of 2005, one of the larger land owners in Success is the Androscoggin Valley
Regional Refuse Disposal District.
categories: Townships in Coos County, New Hampshire
